tool_description: Get blockchain data from Ethereum, Polygon, Binance, Solana mainnets, including Ropsten, Rinkey, Goerly, Kovan, Mumbai testnets.
name: Webit Blockchain
title: Webit Blockchain

api_list.name: Get Balance
api_list.description: Get balance from any wallet on different blockchains, including Ethereum, Polygon, Binance, Solana mainnets, including Ropsten, Rinkey, Goerly, Kovan, Mumbai testnets.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description:
Crypto wallet address to get Balance of.

*Example contains Vitalik Buterin wallet address.*
*Solana addresses are different from Ethereum fork blockchains, so please try `7xKXtg2CW87d97TXJSDpbD5jBkheTqA83TZRuJosgAsU` instead, with `solana` chain parameter selected.*

optional_parameters.name: chain

api_list.name: Converter
Estimate gas

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description:
Target address the action is performed \\\"to\\\".

This can be another wallet address simulating an amount transferring to.

optional_parameters.name: chain
from
optional_parameters.description: Source wallet address the operation is performed \\\"from\\\".

optional_parameters.name: chain

api_list.name: Get latest (current) block

optional_parameters.name: chain

api_list.name: Generate Wallet
api_list.description:
Generate a new crypto wallet.

Supported blockchains are Ethereum, Polygon, Binance mainnets and Ropsten, Rinkey, Goerly, Kovan, Mumbai testnets.

optional_parameters.name: chain
